message.content:
cs.CV, cs.IT, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with image restoration and reconstruction, which is a common topic in computer vision (cs.CV). The use of denoising methods and iterative algorithms also suggests a possible fit with information theory (cs.IT). The proposed method involves selecting class-adapted Gaussian mixture patch priors, which could be seen as a machine learning approach (cs.LG). The paper also mentions the use of brain MRI images, which could suggest a fit with multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the paper proposes a method that performs segmentation and restoration simultaneously, which could be seen as a form of image analysis (cs.AI).
